Verses: 1 aabiragaam Keththooraal Ennum Perkonda Oru Sthreeyaiyum Vivaagampanniyirundhaan.
2 aval Avanukku Simraanaiyum, Yakshaanaiyum, Medhaanaiyum, Meedhiyaanaiyum, Ispaakkaiyum, Soovaagaiyum Petraal.
3 yakshaan Sepaavaiyum, Thedhaanaiyum Petraan; Thedhaanudaiya Kumaarar Asooreem, Leththooseem, Leyoomeem Enbavargal.
4 meedhiyaanudaiya Kumaarar Eppaa, Epper, Aanokku, Apeedhaa, Eldhaagaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Ellaarum Keththooraalin Pillaigal.
5 aabiragaam Thanakku Undaana Yaavaiyum Eesaakkukkuk Koduththaan.

6 aabiragaamukku Irundha Marumanaiyaattigalin Pillaigalukko Aabiragaam Nankodaigalaik Koduththu, Thaan Uyirodirukkumpodhe Avargalaith Than Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakkaivittuk Kizhakke Pogak Keezhdhesaththukku Anuppivittaan.
7 aabiragaam Uyirodirundha Aayusunaatkal Nootru Ezhubaththaindhu Varusham.
8 pirpaadu Aabiragaam Nalla Naraivayadhilum, Mudhirndha Poorana Aayusilum Praanan Poi Mariththu, Than Janaththaarode Serkkappattaan.
9 avan Kumaararaagiya Eesaakkum Ismavelum Mamrekku Edhire Eththiyanaana Sokaarin Kumaaranaagiya Epperonin Nilaththilulla Makpelaa Ennappatta Kugaiyile Avanai Adakkampanninaargal.
10 andha Nilaththai Eththin Puththirar Kaiyile Aabiragaam Vaangiyirundhaan; Ange Aabiragaamum Avan Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalum Adakkampannappattaargal.
11 aabiragaam Mariththapin Dhevan Avan Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakkai Aaseervadhiththaar. Lakaairoyee Ennum Thuravukku Sameebamaai Eesaakku Kudiyirundhaan.
12 saaraaludaiya Adimaippennaagiya Egipthu Dhesaththaalaana Aagaar Aabiragaamukkup Petra Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelin Vamsavaralaaru:
13 parpala Sandhadhigalaaip Pirindha Ismavelin Puththirarudaiya Naamangalaavana; Ismaveludaiya Mooththa Magan Nepaayodh; Pinbu Kedhaar, Adhpiyel, Mipsaam,
14 mishmaa, Thoomaa, Maasaa,
15 aadhaar, Themaa, Yeththoor, Naabees, Kedhmaa Enbavaigale.
16 thangal Graamangalilum Arangalilum Kudiyirundha Thangal Janaththaarukkup Pannirandu Prabukkalaagiya Ismavelin Kumaarargal Ivargale, Ivargaludaiya Naamangalum Ivaigale.
17 ismavelin Vayadhu Nootru Muppaththezhu. Pinbu Avan Praanan Poi Mariththu, Than Janaththaarode Serkkappattaan.
18 avargal Aavilaa Thuvakki Egipthukku Edhiraaga Aseeriyaavukkup Pogira Vazhiyilirukkum Soormattum Vaasampanninaargal. Idhu Avan Sagodharar Ellaarukkum Munbaaga Avan Kudiyerina Boomi.
19 aabiragaamin Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakkudaiya Vamsavaralaaru; Aabiragaam Eesaakkaip Petraan.

20 eesaakku Rebekkaalai Vivaagampannugirapodhu Naarpadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan; Ival Padhaanaraam Ennum Seeriyaa Dhesaththaanaagiya Peththuvelukkuk Kumaaraththiyum, Seeriyaa Dhesaththaanaagiya Laapaanukku Sagodhariyumaanaval.
21 maladiyaayirundha Than Manaivikkaaga Eesaakku Karththarai Nokki Vendudhal Seydhaan; Karththar Avan Vendudhalaik Kettarulinaar; Avan Manaivi Rebekkaal Karppanthariththaal.
22 aval Garppaththile Pillaigal Ondrodondru Modhikkondirundhana; Appozhudhu Aval: Ippadiyaanaal Enakku Eppadiyo Endru Solli, Karththaridaththil Visaarikkumpadi Ponaal.

23 adharkuk Karththar: Irandu Jaadhigal Un Garppaththil Undaayirukkiradhu; Iranduvidha Janangal Un Vayitrilirundhu Piriyum, Avargalil Oru Janaththaar Matra Janaththaaraippaarkkilum Balaththiruppaargal, Mooththavan Ilaiyavanai Sevippaan Endraar.
24 prasavakaalam Pooranamaanapodhu, Aval Garppaththil Irattaip Pillaigal Irundhadhu.
25 mooththavan Sivandha Niramullavanaayum Sarvaangamum Roma Angi Porththavan Polavum Velippattaan; Avanukku Esaa Endru Perittaargal.
26 pinbu, Avan Sagodharan Than Kaiyinaale Esaavin Kudhingaalaip Pidiththukkondu Velippattaan; Avanukku Yaakkobu Endru Perittaargal; Ivargalai Aval Petrapodhu Eesaakku Arubadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan.
27 indhap Pillaigal Periyavargalaanapodhu, Esaa Vettaiyil Vallavanum Vanasanjaariyumaai Irundhaan; Yaakkobu Gunasaaliyum Koodaaravaasiyumaai Irundhaan.
28 esaa Vettaiyaadik Konduvarugiradhu Eesaakkinudaiya Vaaikku Rusigaramaayirundhadhinaale Esaavinmel Patchamaayirundhaan; Rebekkaalo Yaakkobinmel Patchamaayirundhaal.
29 orunaal Esaa Veliyilirundhu Kalaiththu Vandhapodhu, Yaakkobu Koozh Samaiththukkondirundhaan.
30 appozhudhu Esaa Yaakkobai Nokki: Andha Sivappaana Koozhile Naan Saappidak Konjam Thaa, Ilaiththirukkiren Endraan; Idhanaale Avanukku Edhom Engira Per Undaayitru.
31 appozhudhu Yaakkobu: Un Seshta Puththirapaagaththai Indru Enakku Vitruppodu Endraan.
32 adharku Esaa: Idho, Naan Saagappogirene, Indha Seshtapuththirapaagam Enakku Ennaththirku Endraan.
33 appozhudhu Yaakkobu: Indru Enakku Aanaiyittukkodu Endraan; Avan Yaakkobukku Aanaiyittu, Than Seshta Puththirapaagaththai Avanukku Vitruppottaan.
34 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Esaavukku Appaththaiyum Payatrankoozhaiyum Koduththaan; Avan Pusiththuk Kudiththu Ezhundhirundhu Poivittaan. Ippadi Esaa Than Seshta Puththirapaagaththai Alatchiyampanninaan.
